participant_abstract.sent: During our second meeting, we each gave a power point presentation, reporting on research findings and in my case, statistics from a survey that was taken by 100 users.
A lot of time was spent at the end, still trying to come up with a design that is both functional (our main concern) and aesthetically appealing.
From a marketing view point, I didn't have tons to contribute except for sharing my report findings, which have hopefully made us think more about which audience group to target.
We were also given three more pieces of modified criteria to consider for our project.

participant_decisions.sent: Do away with the universal idea.
-continue to focus on fashion and trends so as to achieve an appealing overall look.
Further discuss and consider speech recognition.

participant_problems.sent: We all still challenged somewhat by the idea of getting away from the standard, rectangular remote design -have yet to decide which specific user group we intend to target.
